CustomField.description: Used by the Inside Sales team during their discovery calls
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populate the reason for disqualifying the customer for an L3 Circle Account.
CustomField.label: Disqualification Criteria

value.fullName: Cannot confirm the legitimacy of business
value.label: Cannot confirm the legitimacy of business

value.fullName: Not actively or intending to build with Circle products
value.label: Not actively or intending to build with Circle products

value.fullName: Not actively or intending to build on a blockchain we support
value.label: Not actively or intending to build on a blockchain we support

value.fullName: Not a fit for Circle Alliance Program
value.label: Not a fit for Circle Alliance Program

value.fullName: The proposed minting volume is under 100K threshold
value.label: The proposed minting volume is under 100K threshold
